name: La Quinta Inn & Suites San Diego Mission Bay

reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
reviews.text: We were on a family trip to San Diego and stayed at this hotel and it was awesome. It's in excellent condition. Very good location next to I-5. The staff is super friendly. Specially Zulema and Jerry. Would definitely stay here whenever we come back to the S.D. area.

I stayed with my 2 children ages 10 &16 from Sunday November 17 to Wednesday November 20. I was in town for a mix of Doctor appointment & short vacation. I must say, the staff here are what makes the rating a 5 star. The gentleman at the front desk who checked us in around 5pm was exceedingly polite and informative. I wish I'd gotten his name. He got me extra pillows within minutes of my check in. On Tuesday we realized we'd used all the bath towels. I called front desk & they had the towels, I kid you not, at my door within less than 60 seconds of calling. Breakfast was enough to tide us til afternoon. Oranges, bananas, mini muffins, sausage or bacon, eggs (not the best), biscuits/gravy, English muffins, oatmeal, toast, waffles, cereal, yogurt, and milk/OJ/apple juice/milk. Pool is very intimately small albeit warm on a winters night, and hot tub was relaxing. Plenty of pool towels. There is no view, but you are centrally located to beach (5 min), freeway, plenty of eateries, and downtown is maybe 10 minutes max. I did not have an issue with parking, but was there on weeknight. Furnishings are a hair worn, but comfortable and clean, and beds were nice. Housekeeping was great, and I tipped them $20 for their effort. They earned it. Nice little place for the price tucked in an odd corner right off freeway. I would choose this again, and I am a San Diego native now living in another state, so I know the area well.
reviews.title: 5 star rating for an unusual motel
One night stay
reviews.text: Staff extremely helpful and friendly. Was a weeknight stay and hotel seemed quiet. Whirlpool was outside and very relaxing. Tv wouldn't work in room on check in but they had it replace within 20 minutes. As a single lady I'd come back and stay at this hotel.

reviews.title: Great hotel. Great value.
reviews.text: I normally stay in 5 star hotels when I travel. I'm really picky about what hotels I stay at normally. When I travel with my 2 pitbulls and chiweenie, I don't have much of an option. I never have issues with my dogs at La Quinta so it's my hotel of choice when I bring the pooches. And honestly, I've enjoyed my stay at the la Quinta just as much as any higher rated hotel. The customer service is on point. The rooms are clean. The breakfast buffet offered a lot of options and it wasn't really crappy food. It was actually an enjoyable meal. I felt like I got a lot for the price I paid. I look forward to my next stay.

aka: Mission Bay Inn San Diego Hotel San Diego
description: Distinctively different, the Mission Bay Inn San Diego is conveniently located in Pacific Beach, and only 1 mile to Mission Bay Park. The Mission Bay Inn San Diego is also located within 2 miles of Sea World, San Diego Zoo, Downtown, Old Town, San Diego Convention Center, and the University of California - San Diego. New for 2009, we've installed brand new furniture in all of our rooms! Our guest rooms offer all the conveniences of home, including free wireless high speed Internet access, refrigerator and microwave in all rooms, coffee/tea maker, hairdryer, iron and ironing board, 27-inch television with cable and free local calls. To start off the morning right, stop by for our great hot breakfast, served complimentary to all guests in our brand new breakfast area. USA Today is also provided Monday through Friday for your convenience. A brand new fitness room and guest laundry are also available for your convenience. We offer a sparkling heated pool and jacuzzi for your enjoyment. Our professional staff is courteous, friendly, attentive and committed to making your stay fun, comfortable and memorable with quality accommodations and legendary service to exceed your expectations.
